# Payload templates (Direct) — 2026-01-17

These templates are meant to be copied and adjusted.

How to use:
- For bid modifiers: `./.venv/bin/python scripts/mcp_set_bid_modifiers.py --method <get|add|set|delete> --payload <file.json>`
- For campaign strategy/budget patch: `./.venv/bin/python scripts/mcp_update_campaign_budget_strategy.py --campaign-id <ID> --patch <file.json>`

Recommended workflow:
1) Inspect current objects in your account using `direct.raw_call` (templates below include “get” payloads).
2) Apply the smallest possible patch (only fields you want to change).
3) Verify via `direct.list_campaigns` / `direct.raw_call` `campaigns.get` / `bidmodifiers.get`.
